summary:
A way to marry Susanna, also have her as a follower. The Wicked Susanna (a surviving duplicate)

Susanna the Wicked dies as a part of a quest, Blood on ice. Alas she cannot be saved. But there's always clones, or twins.
descriptionHtml:
[b]
The Wicked Susanna[/b] is found at Candleheart Hall in Windhelm. Like her murdered twin was.

Info/spec:
#1 She is marriable
#2 Serves as a follower (combat rogue)
#3 Non essential NPC (she can die)
#4 She is leveled to your character (ranging from level 15 to 999)

Without disrupting the game quests and avoid rendering save files asunder. Closest thing we can have to the original is a clone, a replication. While it is not original. As in her. Only difference in this case of Susan, is that she is not dead.

To be bound together, now and forever. Or die together, fighting together.

(Textures and Meshes directories have been included to avoid a character appearance bug. That causes the head of the NPC to not match the body.)
author: Feralas
